fatecards.name: +1 Mana for each Wound
fatecards.description: Gain 1 Mana for each Wound on this character (to maximum of 4).

fatecards.name: Active skills cost -1 Action.
fatecards.description: During this activation or interruption, all active skill cost 1 Action less (to minimum of 0).

fatecards.name: +1 Mana for each character with Debuff
fatecards.description: Gain 1 Mana for each character with a Debuff (to maximum of 3).

fatecards.name: Deal 2+ Wounds, gain 1 Action and 1 Mana.

fatecards.name: +1 Die and -1 Wound to all attacks

fatecards.name: Spell attacks +1 Die for every 2 Mana in possession.
fatecards.description:
During this activation or interruption, spell attacks gain +1 Die for every 2 Mana in the character's possession.
          Mana is counted after it is spent for an attack and any additional bonuses.

fatecards.description: Discard a fate card to gain 1 Action and 1 Mana.

fatecards.description: If this character has at least 3 Wounds, gain 1 AP, an Enhancement Buff, and a Knockdown Debuff.

fatecards.name: She-Ra's ultimate skill
fatecards.description:
She-Ra's ultimate skill: She-Ra gains a She-ra token. When She-Ra has a She-ra token, she and all her allies within 8" receive +1 die for all defence tests.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Bow's ultimate skill
fatecards.description:
Bow's ultimate skill: remove up to 3 buffs from allies. Draw a random card from your discard file for every buff removed.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Glimmer's ultimate skill
fatecards.description:
Glimmer's ultimate skill: choose any ally within 12", Glimmer is teleported to a hex adjacent to that ally.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.description:
Castaspella's ultimate skill: all allies withat least 3 Mana gain a Focus.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Frosta's ultimate skill

Frosta's ultimate skill: if this card is played during an interruption, gain 2 Action points.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Angela's ultimate skill
fatecards.description:
Angella's ultimate skill: choose an activated ally within 16" with a buff token. Remove the buff token from that ally, then become ready.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Remove Buff, gain a Focus and 2 mana.
fatecards.description:
If this character has a Buff token, remove it to gain a Focus and 2 Mana.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Keep Buffs or Debuffs at EOR.
fatecards.description:
At the end of this round, the character does not lose their Buffs or Debuffs.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Gain 1 Mana for each ally with a Buff
fatecards.description:
Gain 1 mana for each ally with a Buff (to a maximum of 3).
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: -1 Die for defence tests until Round end
fatecards.description: Until then end of the round, this character loses 1 Die for all defence tests.

fatecards.name: +1 Heavy Weapon scope during activation

During this activation or interruption, add +1 to the scope of Heavy Weapon Attacks.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Vehicle gets free 4-hex move action
fatecards.description:
If this character is a vehicle, make a free 4-hex move action.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Heavy Weapon Attacks -1 Action during activation
fatecards.description:
During this activation or interruption, Heavy Weapon Attacks cost 1 Action less (to a minimum of 1).
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: Discard fate card for a Buff
fatecards.description:
Discard a fate card to gain Protection, Quickness, or Enhancement.
          OR +1 Mana.

fatecards.name: After discard, remove a Debuff from any character
fatecards.description: After this card is discarded during an activation phase, remove a Debuff from any character.

fatecards.name: "Endless" get 1 Action and 1 Mana
fatecards.description:
If this character has any type of "Endless" skill, gain 1 Action and 1 Mana.
          OR +1 Mana.

upgrades.name: Belt
upgrades.definition: If the character has at least 2 Wounds, +1 Strength

upgrades.name: Teleporter
upgrades.definition:
Disposable.
          Place 2 teleporters within 8".

upgrades.name: Shin-Guards
upgrades.definition: All attacks gain +1 Die, but cannot deal more than 1 Wound.

upgrades.name: Reinforced Limbs
upgrades.definition: Attacks of opportunity against a Tyrantisaurus have their scope decreased by 1 (instead of increased)

upgrades.name: King's Goblet
upgrades.definition: At the end of the activation, if the character performed no attacks, they gain a Focus.

upgrades.name: Visor
upgrades.definition: Enemy attacks trigger this character's overwatches. Interruption starts after the attack.

upgrades.name: Assassin's Belt
upgrades.definition: Flank attacks gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Bomb Pack
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Spend 1 AP and place a crater within 8".

upgrades.name: Gas Tank
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Place a gas tank within 12"

upgrades.name: Grayskull Reliquary
upgrades.definition: Upon activation, gain 1 Wound and a Focus

upgrades.name: Book of Living Spells
upgrades.definition: Increase the maximum Mana by 2.

upgrades.name: Leather Jerkin
upgrades.definition: When the character is attacked by the interrupting enemy, gain +1 Die to the defence test.

upgrades.name: Inquisitor Armor
upgrades.definition: This character can be attacked only once during every activation or interruption.

upgrades.name: Wrap
upgrades.definition: Disposable. When this character is about to lose their Buff or Debuff, you can use this card to keep it.

upgrades.name: Magical Shell
upgrades.definition: Defence tests against skills gain 1 Die.

upgrades.name: Magic Lamp
upgrades.definition: Spell attacks gain +1 Die. After the Spell attack, this character receives a Curse debuff if at least one '1' was rolled in the attack test.

upgrades.name: Acid Vial
upgrades.definition: If this character's flank attack results in 2 or more Successes, the target receives a Blind debuff.

upgrades.name: Rotating Shield
upgrades.definition: After being attacked by a frontal Ranged Attack or Spell Attack, this character is pulled 2 hexes towards the attacker.

upgrades.name: Illusionary Attack
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, test (Power) to gain 1 Die per Success received (to maximum of 5).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and draw a fate card
5 successes: 1 Wound and draw 2 fate cards

upgrades.name: Scythe of Doom
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, if the target has a Debuff, remove a Debuff from the target and gain +2 Dice.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and a Curse debuff
5 successes: 2 Wounds and a Curse debuff

upgrades.name: Beast Man's Whip
upgrades.definition:
Once per activation, if Beast Man made a Melee Attack, he can spend 2 Mana to immediately perform a free Melee Attack with this weapon.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Mega Blaster
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, test (Strength) to gain 1 Die per Success received (to maximum of 5).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Ray of Destruction
upgrades.definition:
This spell can be used while engaged. Can only target enemies this character is engaged with.
          Gain 1 Die per Wound on this character (to maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Fatal Flaw
upgrades.definition:
This spell can only target enemies with a Debuff. After the attack, remove a Debuff from the target.
          1 success: This character gains 1 Mana
2 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains 2 Mana
3 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains 3 Mana

upgrades.name: Skull Weapon
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or more Successes, pass this character's Debuff to the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Tyrantisaurus Blaster
upgrades.definition:
This weapon cannot use a Focus and its scope cannot be modified. Gain +1 Die for every 5" between Tyrantisaurus and the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 1 Wound and a Blind debuff
          4 successes: 2 Wounds and a Blind debuff

upgrades.name: Tyrantisaurus Tail
upgrades.definition:
This weapon affects all characters engaged with a Tyrantisaurus.
          -1 Die for every engaged character (to a maximum of 3).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds and push target 2 hexes

upgrades.name: Short Axe
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 1).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and 1 Wound (if this attack had a Focus).

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Human)
upgrades.definition:
If Man-E-Faces gains a Robot Face, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Robot).
          If Man-E-Faces gains a Monster Face, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Monster).
          1 success: 1 Wound
2 successes: 2 Wounds and Man-E-Faces gains a Protection Buff.

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Robot)
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the round, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Human).
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Laser Gun (Monster)
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the round, replace this weapon with Laser Gun (Human).
          This weapon can be used as a melee weapon.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Long Axe
upgrades.definition:
At the end of the activation, if this character has a Focus, gain a Protection Buff.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Rebel Pistol
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot.
          During Interruptions, if this character isn't engaged, this weapon can target any enemy, not only the one interrupted.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and this character gains a Focus.

upgrades.name: Power of Friendship
upgrades.definition:
Targets allies instead of enemies. The target does not make a defense test.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to minimum of 1).
          2 successes: This character and the target gain an Enhancement Buff.

upgrades.name: Swiftness
upgrades.definition:
Targets allies instead of enemies. The target does not make a defense test.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to minimum of 1).
          2 successes: Quickness Buff.
4 successes: Quickness Buff and a Focus

upgrades.name: Club
upgrades.definition:
Gain +1 Die for every activated enemy.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          2 successes: 2 Wounds
          4 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Dragon Blaster
upgrades.definition:
This weapon affects the target and all characters that are both within 3 hexes from the target and within the target's rear arc.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and 1 Wound (only additional target)
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Strong will Fall
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, if the target has a Buff, gain +2 Dice and remove a Buff from the target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Tornado
upgrades.definition:
This spell can target any character, if doesn't affect them, but it does affect other characters within 4 hexes. Pulls caused by this spell are made between main and additional targets.
          1 success: Pull target 1 hex
2 successes: 1 Wound and pull target 2 hexes
3 successes: 1 Wound and pull target 3 hexes

upgrades.name: Metal Fist
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon made immediately after a move action cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 0). Pushes made with this weapon trigger allies' overwatches.
          1 success: Push target 1 hex
          2 successes: 1 Wound and push target 2 hexes
          3 successes: 2 Wound and pull target 3 hexes

upgrades.name: Halberd
upgrades.definition:
For every '6' rolled in the attack test, the target loses 1 defence Die. The number of defence Dice  cannot be reduced by 2.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Magic Wand
upgrades.definition:
This does not use a ranged weapon slot.
          Before attacking, spend up to 3 Mana to gain 1 Dice per Mana spent. The target tests Mind instead of Toughness.
          1 success: Perform a free Spell Attack on the same target
          2  success: Perform a free Spell Attack on the same target at no Mana cost

upgrades.name: Black Blaster
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon are treated as skill tests and attack tests.
          1 success: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Motivational Speech
upgrades.definition:
This spell does not use a spell slot, does not require a target, and tests Strength instead of Power. Do not make a defence test.
          1 success: The next ally activated this round gains 1 AP

upgrades.name: Chain Lightning
upgrades.definition:
If at least one '6' is rolled in this attack, perform a free attack with this spell on another enemy within 6" from the target. This attack uses 2 Dice fewer than the previous one.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Insults
upgrades.definition:
This spell can target any character.
          Attacks with this spell cost 1 AP less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 success: A Curse Debuff and an Enhancement Debuff.
          3 successes: Enhancement Debuff

upgrades.name: Hand of Fate
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, add up to 3 Dice. All successes are cancelled if at least one '1' is rolled in the attack test.
          2 successes: 1 Wound
4 successes: 2 Wounds
6 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Multi-Cannon
upgrades.definition:
Choose up to 3 different targets and attack them one by one. Suffer -1 Die for every chosen target.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Knife of Evil
upgrades.definition:
Attacks with this weapon are always treated as flank attacks, but do not receive a bonus to the scope unless they are really made from a flank.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          2 successes: 1 Wound and change the target's facing
          3 successes: 2 Wounds and change the target's facing

upgrades.name: Cursed Sword
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or less Successes, this character gains a Curse Debuff.
          1 success: 1 Wound
2 successes: 2 Wounds
5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Power Blaster
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 or more Successes, Webstor can perform a free 2-hex move action.
          1 success: 1 Wound
3 successes: 1 Wound and a Curse debuff (if flank attack)
5 successes: 2 Wounds and a Curse debuff (if flank attack)

upgrades.name: Sword of Protection
upgrades.definition:
Before a defence test, spend up to 2 Mana tokens to gain 1 Die per Mana token spent.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 1 Wounds
          5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Combow
upgrades.definition:
Gain +1 Die for every Buff token on Bow.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Angellic Sword
upgrades.definition:
If Angella was activated with initiative 7 or lower, gain +1 Die. Additionally, if Angella was activated with initiative 3 or lower, gain +1 Die.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 2 Wounds
          4 successes: 2 Wounds and 1 Wound if Angella was activated with Initiative 1

upgrades.name: Staff of Light
upgrades.definition:
If this character has a Buff token, upon activation, gain 1 Mana token.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Beam of Light
upgrades.definition:
This spell can target any character. If Glimmer was activated with initiative 8 or higher, attacks with this spell cost 1 Action less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 Success: A Blind token
          2 successes: A Blind token and the target is teleported 3 hexes.

upgrades.name: Ice Spell
upgrades.definition:
During interruptions, attacks with this spell do not receive a penalty to the scope and gain +1 Die.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and a Cripple token
          4 successes: 2 Wounds and a Cripple token

upgrades.name: Mighty Bonk
upgrades.definition:
This spell can be used when engaged. Can only target enemies this character is engaged with. During the interruption, attacks with this spell cost 1 Action less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and the target is pushed 2 hexes.

upgrades.name: Three Moons Presence
upgrades.definition:
This spell affects all your characters with a Buff token. Its scope cannot be modified. Do not make defence tests.
          1 Success: Target loses a Buff token but gains 2 Mana tokens
          2 Successes: Target loses a Buff token but gains 2 Mana tokens and a Focus.

upgrades.name: Moonless Night
upgrades.definition:
This spell affects all characters with a Debuff token. Its scope cannot be modified
          1 Success: Target loses 2 Mmana and a Debuff
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and Target loses 2 Mmana and a Debuff.

upgrades.name: Axe Comb
upgrades.definition:
Gain 1 Die for each ally with a Buff token (to a maximum of 3).
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 successes: 2 Wounds
          5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Bubble Projector
upgrades.definition:
If an attack with this weapon results in 2 of more Successes, an ally within 8" gains a Protection buff.
          1 success: 1 Wound
          4 successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Overwhelming Power
upgrades.definition:
Target allies or enemies. If this spell knocks out the target, the targets allies gain 2 Mana tokens. If the target is an ally with an "Endless Horde" skill +2 Die.
          1 Success: 1 Wound and target gains 2 Mana
          4 Successes: 2 Wounds and target gains 3 Mana

upgrades.name: Calamity
upgrades.definition:
The target must choose to either only roll a number or Dice equal to their Mana tokens for their defence test, or roll dice normally, but only succeed on results of 6.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 2 Wounds
          4 Successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Mana Burn
upgrades.definition:
Gain +1 Die for every Mana token on the target.
          1 Success: 1 Wound and target loses 1 Mana
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and target loses 2 Mana
          3 successes: 2 Wounds and target loses 3 Mana

upgrades.name: Energy Cannon
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking test power to gain 1 Die per success received (to a maximum of 5).
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 Successes: 2 Wounds
          5 successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Two-Sided Gun
upgrades.definition:
Ignore the target's shield.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and remove buff from the target
          4 successes: 2 Wounds and remove buff from the target

upgrades.name: Cosmic Blaster
upgrades.definition:
After attacking, end the character's activation or interruption.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          4 Successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Catra's Whip
upgrades.definition:
Once per activation, after Catra makes a melee attack she can spend 2 Mana to immediately perform a free melee attack with this weapon
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and draw a fate card
          4 Successes: 2 Wounds and draw a fate card

upgrades.name: Horde Axe
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, Grizzlor can spend either 2 Mana to gain one of the bonuses below or 4 Mana to gain both bonuses.
           +2 (die) or focus
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 Successes: 2 Wounds
          4 Successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Horde Staff
upgrades.definition:
Upon activation, gain 1 Mana token for every knocked out ally (to a maximum of 3).
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 Successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Dragon Staff
upgrades.definition:
After attacking, end this characters activation of interruption.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          4 Successes: 2 Wounds

upgrades.name: Propeller Arm
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, discard up to 3 fate cards to gain 1 Die per discarded card.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 Successes: 2 Wounds
          5 Successes: 3 Wounds

upgrades.name: Spinning disc
upgrades.definition: Spell attacks of this character gain 1 free reroll for each ally with a buff token (to a maximum of 3).

upgrades.name: Pink Tiara
upgrades.definition: When this character receives a debuff, they also receive 1 Mana token.

upgrades.name: Heart Emblem
upgrades.definition: When this character received a Buff token, then also receive 1 Mana token.

upgrades.name: Space Armour
upgrades.definition: Defence tests against enemies activated with initiative 7 or hight, gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Energy Shield
upgrades.definition: When a character has a Buff, gain +1 to the scope of defence tests, against all frontal attacks.

upgrades.name: Halo
upgrades.definition: If this character was activated with initiative 3 or lower, during this activation all attack tests gain +1 Die.

upgrades.name: Galactic Gauntlet
upgrades.definition: If this character's attack results in 3 or more Successes, gain 1 Protection.

upgrades.name: Galactic Shoes
upgrades.definition: Rush. Remove a Buff from this character to perform a free 2-hex move action.

upgrades.name: Bat
upgrades.definition: Scouting. Test Mind +1 per every enemy within 12" and draw a fate card per success (to a maximum of 3).

upgrades.name: Harp
upgrades.definition: During any test, this character may discard a fate card to gain 2 free rerolls.

upgrades.name: Horde Armband
upgrades.definition: Whenever an ally is knocked out, gain a focus.

upgrades.name: Cat Mask
upgrades.definition: At the end of activation or interruption, change the characters facing.

upgrades.name: Magic Boots
upgrades.definition: During interruptions +1 to movement, and +2 to focused movement.

upgrades.name: Eldritch Book of Spells
upgrades.definition: After this characters attack knocks out another character. immediately perform a free melee, ranged or magic attack.

upgrades.name: Plate Armour
upgrades.definition: This character cannot be pushed or pulled.

upgrades.name: Cat Shield
upgrades.definition: If this character is the target of a frontal attack, gain 1 Mana.

upgrades.name: Engine Booster
upgrades.definition: Add +2 to Focused Speed.

upgrades.name: Targeting Computer
upgrades.definition: If this vehicle has no Wounds, +1 Die to all attacks.

upgrades.name: Mystic Plating
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Use it before a defence test to attempt it with 5 Dice.

upgrades.name: Reactive Armour
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Gain Protection buff.

upgrades.name: Demolisher Missile
upgrades.definition:
This wepon targets an empty hex and affects all allies and enemies within 2 hexes. After the attack, remove one piece of terrain located within 2 hexes
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          3 Successes: 2 Wounds
          5 Successes: 3 Wounds.

upgrades.name: Heavy Laser
upgrades.definition:
Before attacking, spend up to 5 Mana to gain +1 Die per Mana spent.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 2 Wounds
          4 Successes: 3 Wounds.

upgrades.name: Scorpia's Tail
upgrades.definition:
Immediately after an attack, Scorpia can spend 1 Mana to allow an ally with an "Endless Horde" skill to interrupt the attacked enemy.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 2 Successes: 1 Wound and a Curse debuff.

upgrades.name: Dragonfly Crossbow
upgrades.definition:
If the target it engaged, instead of being decreased, the scope of the attack is increased by 1.
          1 Success: 1 Wound
          2 Successes: 1 Wound and push target 2 hexes.

upgrades.name: Net
upgrades.definition:
During interruptions, attacks with this weapon do not receive a penalty to the scope and cost 1 Action less (to a minimum of 0).
          1 Success: 1 Cripple debuff
          2 Successes: 1 Cripple debuff and target looses 2 Mana.

upgrades.name: Trick
upgrades.definition:
Targets allies instead of enemies. Before attacking, discard a fate card. If you do not, this spell has no effect. After the attack, draw a fate card.
          1 Success:  The target interrupts the current activation or interruption with 0 AP. Apply a bonus from the discarded card to the target.

upgrades.name: Magic Push
upgrades.definition:
If a Spell attack with a different spell results in 2 or more Successes, the character can immediately perform a free Spell attack with this spell against the same target.
          1 Success: The target is pushed 2 hexes.

upgrades.name: Slug Armour
upgrades.definition: Gain +1 Toughness and +1 Mind for every 2 Mana in Leech's possession. Leech loses 1 Mana after every defence test.

upgrades.name: Skull
upgrades.definition: Decrease the maximum Mana by 3.

upgrades.name: Amulet of Kulataks
upgrades.definition: Shared Fate. Choose an ally within 12". Pass a common Debuff and a common Buff from the ally to this character.

upgrades.name: Buzz Saw
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Use it before any test. Gain 4 Successes, but do not roll any Dice.

upgrades.name: Mud-Monster
upgrades.definition: Disposable. Place a Mud-Monster within 12".

skills.name: I Have the Power!
skills.definition: During any test, He-Man may reroll 1 extra (die) for each (mana token) spent on rerolls.

skills.name: Superhuman Reflex
skills.definition: He-Man cannot receive (mana token) from fate and glory cards. If he gains a (focus token), he also gainst 1 (mana token).

skills.name: Shared Power
skills.definition: Any Ally within 8" can spend Evil-Lyn's mana as their own.

skills.name: Dark Presence
skills.definition:
Test (power) against the (mind) of an enemy within 16".
            1 (success): (blind debuff token).

skills.name: Summon
skills.definition:
Test (power) -2.
            1 (success): Choose an ally within 12". and teleport the ally to a hex adjacent to Skeletor.

skills.name: Lord of Destruction
skills.definition: Until the end of the current activation or interruption, Skeletor can use (spell) while engaged.

skills.name: Always Vigilant
skills.definition: At the end of the activation, if there are no enemies within 8", gain an (overwatch token).

skills.name: Master Tactician
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1.
            1 (success): The next ally activated this round gains 2 (mana token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: To the Sky!
skills.definition: If Stratos isnt' engaged, spend up to 5 (mana token) to jump 1 hex for every (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Leader of Avion
skills.definition:
Test (power). 1 (success): Choose any activated ally (line of sight not required).
            This ally gains a (focus token) or an (overwatch token).
            This ability cannot be used during an interruption.

skills.name: Magic Hat
skills.definition:
Orko starts the game with 3 (mana token).
            Before Orko or ally within 8" makes a defence test, Orko may spend up to 3 (mana token) and add to this test 1 extra (die) per (mana token) spent.

skills.name: Traveller from Trolla
skills.definition:
After spending (mana token) and (action) for (spell), but before making an attack test, Orko has to make a (mind) +1 test.
            If he does not roll at least 2 (success), his spell has no effect.

skills.name: Ramming Speed
skills.definition:
Ram Man makes a free move action with his (speed) value +2 (to a maximum of 6). Test (strenth) against (toughness) of each enemy within 2 hexes.
            1 (success): (Knockdown debuff token)

skills.name: Human Battering Ram
skills.definition: If Ram Man ends his activation engaged, he gains a (focus token).

skills.name: Instant Puddle
skills.definition:
Test (power).
            1 (success): Place a (Mer-Man mark token) within 8". The area within 2 hexes from a (Mer-Man mark token) is treated as difficult terrain.

skills.name: Freezing Ray
skills.definition:
Test (power) +1 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (cripple debuff token).

skills.name: Gammavision
skills.definition:
Test (power) +2 against the (mind) of an enemy within 12".
            1 (success): (Tri-Klops mark token), all attacks against a character with a (Tri-Klops mark token) gain a (focus token).

skills.name: Optic Blast!
skills.definition:
If an enemy within 8" receives a (Debuff token), Tri-Klops can spend 1 to 3 (mana token) and test (power) (+1 Die per (mana token) spent) against the (mind) of this enemy.
            1 (success): 1 (wound token).

skills.name: Weapon Swap
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Laser Attachment'.
            If Trap Jaw has the 'Laser Attachment' equipped, replace it with the 'Hook Attachment'.

skills.name: Grappling Hook
skills.definition:
If Trap Jaw has the 'Hook Attachment' equipped, test (perception) -1.
            Trap Jaw can jump in a straigth line up to 2 hexes per (success).

skills.name: Acrobatic
skills.definition:
Once per her interruption Teela can perform a free 2 hex move action.
            This action can be made in any direction and cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Warrior Goddess
skills.definition: Allies within 8" can reroll up to 2 (Dice) during their skill tests.

skills.name: Vision of the Future
skills.definition:
Test (Power).
            For every Success look at a top fate card, then place them back on the top of a fate deck in any order.

skills.name: Telepathic Guide
skills.definition:
This ability can only be used during an interruption. Choose an ally within 12" and test (Power) -1.
            2 Successes: The ally interrupts the same enemy.

skills.name: Eye of the Bee
skills.definition: All tests with a Focus, gain +1 Die.

skills.name: Hero in the Sky
skills.definition: Each time an ally gets a Focus, Buzz-Off can immediately jump 1 hex. This movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Face of the Robot
skills.definition: Gain (Robot Face) and a Focus.  (Robot Face) provides Man-E-Faces with +2 (Perception) and -1 (Toughness).

skills.name: Face of the Monster
skills.definition:
Gain (Monster Face).  (Monster Face) provides Man-E-Faces with +2 (Strength) and -1 (Mind). Test (Strength) -1 against the (Toughness) of an enemy engaged with Man-E-Faces.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound

skills.name: Lone Warrior
skills.definition: At the end of the activation, if there are no other characters within 6", gain an Overwatch.

skills.name: Eager to Punch
skills.definition: The Melee attack made immediately after a move action gain +2 Dice.

skills.name: Heroic Guard
skills.definition: Whenever an ally on an adjacent hex is about to be attacked, if that attack can target the Palace Guard, you may redirect it to him.

skills.name: Endless Heroes
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Palace Guards in a single force.

skills.name: Lead by Example
skills.definition: Any ally within 12" can use this skill as their own. He-Man interrupts this ally's activation or interruption. During this interruption He-Man can move in any direction.

skills.name: Tiger's Claw
skills.definition:
Test (Strength) -1 against the (Mind) of an enemy engaged with He-Man.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound.
            2 (Successes): 1 Wound and a (Knockdown debuff).

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.definition:
Test (Power) +1 against the (Mind) of an ally within 16".
            1 (Success): (Curse Debuff), Scareglow performs a free move action.

skills.name: Fearsome Presence
skills.definition:
If any character ends their activation or interruption within 2 hexes from Scareglow, test (Power) against (Mind) of that character.
            1 (Success): (Curse Debuff).

skills.name: Primal Rage
skills.definition:
Upon activation:
            If Beast man has at least 1 Wound: gain 1 Mana.
            Additionally, if Beast Man has at least 3 Wounds: gain 1 AP.

skills.name: Supernatural Endurance
skills.definition: When receiving at least 2 Wounds, Beast Man may spend 1 Mana, to reduce the number of Wounds received by 1.

skills.name: Cold-Blooded
skills.definition: Whiplash cannot perform a focus action. Each time an ally receives at least 1 (Wound), Whiplash gains a (Focus token).

skills.name: Tail Trashing
skills.definition: Choose a character on an adjacent hex and test (Strength). Target is pushed up to 1 hex per (Success).

skills.name: Evil Master of Odors
skills.definition:
At the end of activation, remove all 'Mana tokens' and test 'Toughness' against 'Mind' of all other characters within (+1 per Mana removed) hexes.
            1 (success): (Blind debuff token) or (Knockdown debuff token) or (Cripple debuff token).

skills.name: Stinking Delight
skills.definition: When any character gains a (Debuff), Stinkor gains 1 (Mana token).

skills.name: Master of Escape
skills.definition: Immediately after Webstor receives at least 1 Wound, he can jump up to 4 hexes. This movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Hide and Seek
skills.definition: Gain a Webstor Token. When Webstor has a Webstor token, he can only be attacked or interrupted by characters within 6", and his flank attacks gain +2 Dice.

skills.name: Hovering Goon
skills.definition: Move actions performed by Hover Robot use jump rules.

skills.name: Endless Evil
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Hover Robots in a single force.

skills.name: Deception
skills.definition: During Skeletor's activation or interruption, Skeletor gains 1 Mana for every played fate card.

skills.name: Panthor's Fangs
skills.definition:
Test (Strength) against (Toughness) of an Enemy engaged with Skeletor.
            1 (Success): 1 Wound.
            2 (Successes): 1 Wound and push target 1 hex.

skills.name: Superhuman Senses
skills.definition:
She-Ra cannot receive (mana token) from fate and glory cards.
             When her ally gains a Buff token, she gains 1 Mana token.

skills.name: One for All
skills.definition:
Before making an attack test, She-Ra can remove Buff token from any allies.
             Gain 1 extra die for every Buff token removed.

skills.name: Golden Heart
skills.definition: Bow can have up to 3 different Buff Tokens.

skills.name: Heroic Intervention
skills.definition: Remove a Buff token from Bow to gain 1 Action and 1 Mana token.

skills.name: Guiding Light
skills.definition: If Glimmer is ready, after revealing activation cards, the controlling player can use their card to activate Glimmer and overwrite the card's initiative with 10.

skills.name: Guiding Light
skills.definition: If Glimmer is ready, after revealing activation cards, the controlling player can use their card to activate Glimmer and overwrite the card's initiative with 10.

skills.name: Invisibility
skills.definition: Choose an ally within 12". This ally gains a Glimmer token, which allows them to only be targeted from adjacent hexes. Upon activation or interruption, they lose a Glimmer token.

skills.name: Neverending Life
skills.definition: If Angella was activated with initiative 2 or lower, at the end of her activation, she gains a Regeneration token.

skills.name: Selfless Leader
skills.definition:
If Angella was activated with initiative 5 or lower, choose an ally with 8" and test Power-1.
             1 Success: Regeneration token.

skills.name: Magic for All
skills.definition: Test Power. For every Success give 1 Mana token to any activated ally.

skills.name: Arcane Arts
skills.definition: If Castaspella has a Buff token, her Magic and skills cost 1 Mana less (to a minimum of 0).

skills.name: Freezing Rain
skills.definition: After revealing her activation cards, Frosta can spend 1 Mana token to reduce or increase the initiative of one of those cards by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

skills.name: Sub-Zero
skills.definition: If any enemy witin 12" is activated with initiative 7 or higher, Frosta can spend 1 Mana token to interrupt this enemey's activations.

skills.name: I Command You
skills.definition: Choose an ally with an "Endless Horde" skill within 12" and an enemy within 16". The ally interrupts Hordak but acts as if they are interrupting the targeted enemy.

skills.name: Ruthless Leader
skills.definition: +1 Power and +1 Strength for every knocked out ally (to a maximum of 3).

skills.name: Covered with Fur
skills.definition: After you discard a fate card during an activation phase, Grizzlor gains 1 Mana.

skills.name: The Ferocious Warrior
skills.definition: When the enemy attack knocks out an ally, Grizzlor interrupts the current activation or interruption.

skills.name: Nimble Evasion
skills.definition: Once per round, when Catra receives at least 1 Wound, she may discard a fate card to reduce the number of Wounds by 1.

skills.name: It Belongs to Me
skills.definition: During her activation or interruption, Catra may discard a glory card to gain 2 Actions or a fate card to perform a free 2-hex move action. The movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Mind Control
skills.definition:
Test Power against Mind of an unengaged enemy within 16".
            1 Success: The target interrupts Shadow Weaver and must perform a move action, using as many movement points as possible.

skills.name: Shadow Magic
skills.definition: Whenever an ally is knocked out, transfer all Mana from that ally to the Shadow Weaver.

skills.name: Hordak's Enforcer
skills.definition: When a Horde trooper is knocked out, shuffle 2 random fate cards from your discard pile back to your deck.

skills.name: Endless Horde
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Horde Troopers in a single force.

skills.name: For the Evil Horde!
skills.definition: When a Horde Wraith is about to be knocked out, it can spend 2 Mana to switch positions with an ally.

skills.name: Endless Horde
skills.definition: There can be up to 2 Wraiths in a single force.

skills.name: Power Drain
skills.definition: When an enemy within 12" loses or uses Mana, Leech gains 1 Mana.

skills.name: Stuck to the Wall
skills.definition: Move over a portion of an adjacent obstacle.

skills.name: Hunter Instinct
skills.definition: Choose an ally with and "Endless Horde" skill within 12". Make a free move action towards this ally. This movement cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Living Shield
skills.definition: Whenever Scorpia is about to be attacked, if that attack can target an ally with an "Endless Horde" skill on an adjacent hex, you may redirect it to them.

skills.name: Vehicle
skills.definition: Battle Ram ignores 1 Wound from every Melee and Ranged attack (to a minimum of 0).

skills.name: Indirect Fire
skills.definition: Place a Battle Ram token within 16". When an enemy ends their movement within 2 hexes from the Battle Ram token, they must make a defence Toughness test. Unless they score at least 2 Successes, they receive 1 Wound.

skills.name: Radio Communication
skills.definition: Allies with an "Endless Horde" skill can use Hordak's trinkets as their own.

skills.name: A Thousand Cuts
skills.definition:
Test Strength against the Toughness of all enemies within 2 hexes.
            1 Success: 1 Wound.

skills.name: Hero to the Rescue!
skills.definition: After revealing her activation cards, Frosta can spend 1 Mana to reduce or increase the initiative of one of those cards by 2 (to a minimum of 1).

skills.name: Flying Beauty
skills.definition: Test Power +2. Jump up to 1 hex per Success (to a maximum of 6).
